mapper.select: SELECT campaignid, name, code, startdate, enddate, rtime, mtime, note, trackercode, publisherids, launchingurl, state, appname, clickcnt, installcnt, revenue ,(select value from sitecode where category='trackersite' and code=campaign.trackercode ) as trackername FROM campaign WHERE campaignid=#{campaignid} LIMIT 1
SELECT campaignid, name, code, startdate, enddate, rtime, mtime, note, trackercode, publisherids, launchingurl, state, appname, clickcnt, installcnt, revenue FROM campaign WHERE code=#{code} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campaign ( name, code, startdate, enddate, rtime, mtime, note, trackercode, publisherids, launchingurl, state, appname, clickcnt, installcnt, revenue ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{code}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{note}, #{trackercode}, #{publisherids}, #{launchingurl}, #{state}, #{appname}, #{clickcnt}, #{installcnt}, #{revenue} )
mapper.update: UPDATE campaign SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, note = #{note}, trackercode = #{trackercode}, publisherids = #{publisherids}, launchingurl = #{launchingurl}, state = #{state}, appname = #{appname}, mtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE campaignid = #{campaignid}
